Description: Rest on the Flight into Egypt; the Virgin seated underneath a tree at centre; the Christ Child on her lap touching her veil; Joseph in left background, cutting palm leaves. Etching
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (24)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: F A C Prestel (sale Frankfurt, 16.v.1870/646)
